title: Search for the super
creator_credit: Peter Batty Productions, Peter Batty and Anne Batty
brief_description:
Episode of Series “Visions of War”.
This is the fascinating background story to the making and testing of the first H-Bomb. It contains much fine colour archive film as well as contributions from many of the principal participants in the hydrogen-bomb saga. The story continues on from the first atomic bomb drops on Hiroshima and Nagasaki in 1945, through to the bomb test at Bikini Atoll in 1954.
creator_credit_for_label: Peter Batty Productions, Peter Batty and Anne Batty
